Title: AlphaGet
Description:
AlphaGet is a download manager for Windows. 
You can drag links onto the AlphaGet Widget and it will download a file on the selected folder.

It is developed in C# 4.0 and Windows Presentation Foundation.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
AlphaGet is a download manager for Windows.
You can drag links onto the AlphaGet Widget and it will download a file on the selected folder.

It is developed in C# 4.0 and Windows Presentation Foundation.

AphaGet is now deprecated. Check out its successor VIPHYS Downloader:
http://sourceforge.net/projects/viphysdown/
